entry.summary: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Russell and central Washington Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 355 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Allison Gap to 12 miles southwest of Cleveland Va. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 3:47PM EDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Franklin County through 415 PM EDT... At 347 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sontag, or over Sydnorsville, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Roanoke , the City of Salem and the City of Roanoke through 415 PM EDT... At 345 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Glenvar, or near Salem, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail.
